content: I'm trying to load a cdylib from a program. I cargo build it, dlopen it, but when calling a function, macOS SIGKILLs the process, with a code signing error in console. Apparently, the library already has an ad-hoc signature, but overriding it with codesign -f -s - /path/to/my.dylib. Does the compiler touch anything relating to codesigning on macOS, or...?
